title: Good faith immunity
context: ยง586-25 Good faith immunity. Any law enforcement officer acting in good faith shall be immune from civil or criminal liability in any action arising in connection with enforcement of a valid foreign protective order or a foreign protective order that appears to be authentic on its face pursuant to this part. [L 2000, c 186, pt of ยง7; am L 2002, c 11, ยง1]
